channel.title: Finally! Someone's doing a good stealth game on iOS!
channel.description:
[url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/486250632/republique-by-camouflaj-logan[/url]
This looks really damn cool. I'd kickstart for it, but I'm fresh out of money. Tim Schafer and Christian Allen already mugged me.

item.title: Finally! Someone's doing a good stealth game on iOS!
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I haven’t seen Victor Lucas since 2004 on G4 back when it was actually G4…

Read full topic
item.source: Finally! Someone's doing a good stealth game on iOS!
